description: Format used to define new heroes in VCMI
title: VCMI hero format

___index.description: Private field to break things, do not use.

___special.description: Marks this object as special and not available by default

___specialties.description: Specialty format used for OH3 heroes. Use "specialty" instead

___skills.description: List of skills initially known by hero

___specialtyLarge.description: Large image of hero specilty, used in hero screen

___large.description: Large version of portrait for use in hero screen

___specialtySmall.description: Small image of hero specialty for use in exchange screen

___small.description: Small version of portrait for use on adventure map

___class.description: Hero class, e.g. knight or battleMage

___army.description: Initial hero army when recruited in tavern

___specialty.description: Description of hero specialty using bonus system

___growsWithLevel.description: Specialty growth with level, so far only SECONDARY_SKILL_PREMY and PRIMATY SKILL with creature limiter can grow

___texts.description: All translatable texts related to hero

___description.description: Description visible when hovering over specialty icon

___spellbook.description: List of starting spells, if available. This entry (even empty) will also grant spellbook

___female.description: This hero is female (changeable via editor)
